laboratory_examinations.findings: Leucocytosis (WBC count 15.4 x 10^9/L, neutrophil 13.4 x 10^9/L), eosinophilia (0.94 x 10^9/L; normal range 0.00–0.40), thrombocytopenia (platelets 84 x 10^9/L), hypoalbuminaemia (22 g/L), raised inflammatory markers (C-reactive protein 100 mg/L, erythrocyte sedimentation rate 109 mm/hour)
HIV antibody positive; CD4 count 100 cells/mm³ (11%), viral load 59,974 copies/mL. Hepatitis C antibody negative.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Virological suppression achieved (viral load <50 RNA copies/ml) on HAART with CD4 counts in excess of 600 cells/mm³.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Polyclonal increase in IgG (51.7 g/L) and IgM (4.0 g/L)
Cholesterol 4.2 mmol/L (normal range 4.0–6.5), triglyceride 2.28 mmol/L (normal range 0.00–1.70)
Patency of the right posterior tibial and peroneal arteries from origin to proximal segment with no flow distally; normal aorta
Abrupt arterial occlusion at the upper peroneal and distal posterior tibial arteries
